title: Mid-Term Exam Schedule Released
content: The mid-term examination schedule for all subjects has been posted on the notice board. Please check your exam dates and prepare accordingly. Good luck!

title: Programming Contest Registration Open
content: Annual DPI Programming Contest 2025 registration is now open. Teams of 3 members can register by January 15th. Prizes worth 50,000 BDT awaiting!

title: Library Extended Hours
content: During exam period, the library will remain open until 11:00 PM from Monday to Friday. Weekend hours: 9:00 AM to 8:00 PM.

title: Guest Lecture on AI Ethics
content: Join us for an exclusive guest lecture on 'Ethics in Artificial Intelligence' by Dr. Mehrab Hossain from BUET on January 10th at 2:00 PM in the Main Auditorium.

title: Semester Fee Payment Reminder
content: Final reminder: Semester fees must be paid by January 20th to avoid late payment charges. Payment can be made online or at the accounts office.

title: New WiFi Network Available
content: A new high-speed WiFi network 'DPI-Students-5G' is now available across campus. Password: DPI2025@Student. Enjoy faster internet!

title: Career Fair 2025 Announcement
content: DPI Career Fair 2025 will be held on February 15-16. Over 50 companies will participate. Start preparing your resumes and portfolios!
